scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon --quiet --watch src --ext ts,tsx,js,json --exec 'npm run clean:lib && tsc && cp -r src/. web-app/src/assets/system-custom && cp lib/main.js web-app/src/assets/system-custom/main.js'" "npm --prefix functions run build:watch"
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npx stoker build-web-app && rm -rf web-app && mkdir web-app && cp -r node_modules/@stoker-platform/web-app/. web-app/ && stoker apply
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run web:dev" "stoker start"
scripts.lint: tsc --noEmit && eslint . && npm --prefix functions run lint
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:functions
scripts.build: tsc && node bin/build.js && if [ -f .env/.env.project.$GCP_PROJECT ]; then grep -h '^FB_FUNCTIONS_\|^FB_AI_REGION\|^STOKER_\|^ADMIN_' .env/.env.project.$GCP_PROJECT .env/.env.$GCP_PROJECT > functions/.env; else grep -h '^FB_FUNCTIONS_\|^FB_AI_REGION\|^STOKER_\|^ADMIN_' .env/.env .env/.env.$GCP_PROJECT > functions/.env; fi && rm -r -f functions/src/system-custom && cp -r src/. functions/src/system-custom && node bin/shim.js && npm --prefix functions run build
